alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Inland (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 27 at 8:45AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Baldwin and northwestern Escambia Counties through 945 AM CDT... At 845 AM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 6 miles northeast of Stapleton, or 6 miles southeast of Bay Minette, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bay Minette and Stapleton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until noon CDT for southwestern Alabama...and northwestern Florida.
